scripts.extract:panels: for f in assets/pizarro/*.avif; do bun run panelExtractor/src/index.ts "$f" -o "${f%.avif}.json"; done
scripts.extract:bubbles: for f in assets/pizarro/*.avif; do (cd bubbleExtractor && uv run python extract.py "../$f" --output-dir ../assets/pizarro --no-visualize); done
scripts.extract:ocr: for f in assets/pizarro/*.avif; do base=$(basename "$f" .avif); (cd ocr && uv run python run_ocr.py --image "../$f" --bubbles "../assets/pizarro/${base}-bubbles.json" --output "../assets/pizarro/${base}-ocr.json"); done
scripts.extract:all: bun run extract:panels && bun run extract:bubbles && bun run extract:ocr
scripts.translate: for f in assets/pizarro/*-ocr.json; do base=$(basename "$f" -ocr.json); bun run translator/src/index.ts --input "$f" --output "assets/pizarro/${base}-translation.json" --album "Tintin and the Picaros"; done
scripts.build: bun run extract:all && bun run generate
